item.title: Super Mario Bros 3
item.description: Me and two other students, (Giuseppe Alfieri and Jacopo Saccocci) we have replicated a level of super mario bros 3. It was made with C++ and Qt frameworks, the source code is on my github. You can download and play at the following link: download here(for windows, only 64 bits)

item.title: Grafo bipartito
item.description: Problema di algoritmi svolto e formalizzato: Grafo
